Package gw.webservice.login

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ILoginAPI
    A remote interface that allows a user to log in and out of a system. The system uses conversations to implement SOAP authentication in a Guidewire application (e.g. BillingCenter, ClaimCenter, PolicyCenter). When connecting to Guidewire applications the caller must first authenticate using the ILoginAPI.login() method. This method returns the the session ID of the server session. On each successive call in the conversation, pass the session ID in the SOAP header {@link gw.pl.util.webservices.Globals#GW_AUTHENTICATION_SECURITY_TOKEN_CONTEXT_PROPERTY}. You must call logout() when you are done with the conversation. NOTE: This API is intended for users who are using Guidewire's web services from languages other than Java. If you are using Java, you should use the APILocator instead.
